activities: HOV Services, Inc (“HOVS”) is a leader in Global Business Process Outsourcing (BPO).  HOVS combines leading edge technology and infrastructure with subject matter expertise to result in end-to-end solutions for data process and information services.  HOVS USA provides workflow process and composition services to payroll check, advice and P60 data.  Personal information is received by HOV Services within the USA.  HOVS processes the data in the USA and transfers fully composed data to the UK for print and distribution services within the UK.  HOVS streamlines and integrates processes with HOVS’s workflow to provide BPO service offerings.  In addition, HOV Services provides Account Payable transactions including, but not limited to: Account Transfers, Check Requests, Accounts Payable Processing, Statements and Invoices, and Printing.  HOVS transfers such data between various European Union states, and the USA.
eucountries: Austria, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human Resources Data; Accounts Payable Processing; Invoices and Statements; Payments: Transfers; Checks and Printing
